level.text: The Regulations apply to all procurements made by the Authority. In the case of a procurement funded with federal, state or local funds, the Regulations shall be applied to conform to the requirements of the funding source, except to the extent that doing so would prevent compliance with the terms and conditions of other applicable federal, state, or local laws.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 613 (January 22, 1999) [EXPIRED]; as Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7349 (September 17, 1999); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 4484 (June 12, 2009).
